basics.name: Christopher Tan
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a BBA in Accounting & MIS at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Fall, 2024.

education.area: Accounting and Management Information System (expected Fall, 2024)

highlights: Serves as a liaison between Becker and the University of Hawaii at Manoa
Prepares and organizes guest lectures for students
Conducted control testing to assess that internal controls were being performed
Processed samples to evaluate compliance with grant terms

highlights: Created a budget for all club-related expenses
Monitoring and processing cash receipts and disbursements for operations
